name: tableRowInsertedCountToBeBetween
displayName: Table Row Inserted Count To be Between
description: This schema defines the test tableRowInsertedCountToBeBetween. Test the number of rows inserted is between x and y.

parameterDefinition.name: columnName
parameterDefinition.description: Name of the Column. It should be a timestamp, date or datetime field.

parameterDefinition.name: rangeInterval
parameterDefinition.description: Interval Range. E.g. if rangeInterval=1 and rangeType=DAY, we'll check the numbers of rows inserted where columnName=-1 DAY
